macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Equities Rebalance with Debasement Trade Flows; Dow Holds Above 50,000
items.summary: US markets saw a rebound driven by tech stocks like Oracle, Microsoft, Palantir, and Nvidia amid a US dollar sell-off, with the Dow Jones closing flat at 50,156.86 while Nasdaq led gains for the first time since January 28. Markets remain cautious ahead of Tuesday's Retail Sales and Employment Cost Index data influencing Fed expectations.

items.title: US Indices Close Mixed; Dow Up Slightly, Nasdaq and S&P 500 Dip
items.summary: Dow Jones rose 0.04% to 50,156.86, Nasdaq fell 0.28% to 23,214.50, and S&P 500 declined 0.13% to 6,974.25 in a session marked by rebalancing and position closures before key US economic data.

items.title: Asian Markets Rise; Nikkei Surges 2.77% as GIFT Nifty Signals Flat Open
items.summary: Nikkei 225 jumped 2.77% to 57,926.07 and Hang Seng gained 0.60% to 27,188.00, while GIFT Nifty at 25,981.50 points to a flat to positive Indian market open amid mixed global cues.

items.title: Commodities Mixed with Gold at $5,048 and Crude Oil Down
items.summary: Gold declined 0.62% to $5,048.10 and silver fell 1.38% to $81.10, while crude oil dipped 0.28% to $64.18; earlier gold hit $5,100 amid safe-haven demand and Chinese accumulation data.

items.title: Markets Eye Key Data: US Retail Sales, Employment Cost Index, and Fed Speakers
items.summary: Tuesday's US Retail Sales and Employment Cost Index are critical for inflation and Fed outlook, with hawkish speakers Hammack and Logan potentially amplifying reactions; China CPI/PPI also in focus for deflation signals.

items.title: Indian Companies Escorts Kubota and Grasim Industries Announce Q3 Results
items.summary: Key Indian firms Escorts Kubota and Grasim Industries are set to release Q3 earnings, with FII/FPI net buying and USD/INR at 90.70 influencing market direction amid global cues.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: White House Stablecoin Meeting Could Advance CLARITY Act
items.summary: A White House meeting scheduled for February 10 on stablecoin policy may resolve disputes over stablecoin rewards and push forward the stalled CLARITY Act, a key crypto market-structure bill facing Senate hurdles.

items.title: BlackRock-Linked Crypto Wallets See $3.6 Billion Outflow
items.summary: Crypto wallets tied to BlackRock recorded $3.6 billion in net outflows from February 6-9, primarily in Bitcoin ($3.39B) and Ethereum ($239M), amid market stress and Bitcoin testing $60,000 support.

items.title: Bitcoin Slips Below $70,000 Amid Rangebound Trading
items.summary: Bitcoin traded 2.2% lower at $69,393 early Tuesday, failing to hold gains after rebounding from $60,000 lows, as investors await U.S. CPI data and potential hawkish Fed policy shifts.

items.title: Bithumb Exchange Accidentally Sends $44 Billion in Bitcoin
items.summary: South Korean exchange Bithumb erroneously credited users with 620,000 BTC ($44B) during a promo event on Friday, recovering 99.7% after a sell-off; regulators call for stricter oversight.

items.title: Bitcoin Briefly Surpasses $70,000 USDT
items.summary: Bitcoin crossed above 70,000 USDT early February 10, trading at 70,116 USDT per Binance data, amid volatile price action.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: University of Michigan Unveils Prima AI for Rapid Brain MRI Analysis
items.summary: Researchers at the University of Michigan developed Prima, an AI system that analyzes brain MRI scans in seconds with 97.5% accuracy, outperforming other models and prioritizing urgent cases. Published in Nature Biomedical Engineering, it could transform healthcare diagnostics amid rising MRI demand.

items.title: NTT DATA Acquires Zero&One to Boost AI and Cloud Services in MENA
items.summary: NTT DATA acquired Zero&One, the first AWS Premier Tier Partner in the Middle East and North Africa, enhancing its AI, machine learning, cloud-native services, and data analytics capabilities. The move targets rapid growth in the regional cloud market.

items.title: Hybrid Quantum-AI Algorithm Achieves Sub-Exponential Speedup for Enzyme Optimization
items.summary: Researchers demonstrated a hybrid quantum-classical algorithm using QUBO models and AI that reduces errors in enzyme fermentation optimization to 0.78%, offering O(n^2) complexity far better than brute-force methods. Detailed in arXiv preprint, it accelerates complex biological problem-solving.

items.title: AI News: Multimodal Models Advance, On-Device AI Explodes, Major Investments Announced
items.summary: Daily update highlights breakthroughs in multimodal AI processing text, images, video, and audio; rising on-device AI, open-source tools, and $200B investments in infrastructure. Trends include healthcare disease detection, 300% manufacturing efficiency gains, and AI ethics debates.

items.title: Harvard Business Review: AI Intensifies Work Rather Than Reducing It
items.summary: New research shows AI tools like document drafting and code debugging do not lessen workloads but intensify them, challenging promises of freeing time for high-value tasks amid low employee adoption.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: CyberConnect2 Announces 30th Anniversary Game Project Reveal on February 16
items.summary: CyberConnect2 will unveil a completely new video game title as the culmination of its technology, strength, and courage on Monday, February 16, 2026.

items.title: PlayStation State of Play Scheduled for February 12 with Over 60 Minutes of Announcements
items.summary: Sony's State of Play livestream on Thursday, February 12 at 2 PM PT / 5 PM ET will feature news, gameplay updates, and announcements from third-party, indie, and PlayStation Studios games for PS5.

items.title: Crisol: Theater of Idols Releases Today on PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC
items.summary: The first-person action horror game set in a nightmarish version of Mexico launches on February 10, 2026, across multiple platforms.

items.title: Xsolla to Showcase New Direct-to-Consumer Brand for Developers at DICE Summit 2026
items.summary: Xsolla announces a new brand at DICE Summit 2026 to empower developers with tools to launch, grow, and succeed in direct-to-consumer models.

items.title: Take-Two Praises Netflix Partnership as Red Dead Redemption Nears Milestone
items.summary: Take-Two highlights its Netflix collaboration amid recent financial results, with Roblox also raising its full-year revenue forecast to $6-6.2 billion.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Alphabet Launches $20 Billion Global Bond Offering Including Historic 100-Year Bond
items.summary: Alphabet is conducting a major global bond spree to raise $20 billion to fund its massive AI spending plans, including pitching investors in Switzerland and the UK. The offering includes tech's first 100-year bond since the dot-com era.

items.title: S&P 500 and Nasdaq Rally as Tech Stocks Rebound Ahead of Earnings
items.summary: The S&P 500 edged closer to record highs while the Nasdaq Composite posted strong gains, with technology stocks leading the advance. The Dow Jones Industrial Average also achieved a new all-time high.

items.title: Global Markets Extend Gains on Tech Optimism; Asian Bourses Rally
items.summary: Japan's Nikkei 225 surged to fresh record levels following Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi's landslide election victory, while South Korea's Kospi and India's indices also traded higher on market-friendly sentiment.

items.title: 2026 IPO Market Shows Strong Enthusiasm for Tech Companies
items.summary: The IPO market is experiencing renewed enthusiasm in 2026, with multiple technology companies preparing to go public amid broader market optimism.
